xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: githubimporter.description.title=Description githubimporter.description=This application provides the ability to import and convert pages from GitHub to XWiki with various options. The following form provides the options to import the pages. More details on this extension and its usage are available on the [[Extension Page>>https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/GitHub%20Importer%20Application/]] on XWiki Extensions Wiki. githubimporter.description.options=Importer Options githubimporter.sourcetype.title=Source Type githubimporter.sourcetype.hint=This can be URL or a local File/Directory path. (Note: Internet access is required for URL source). githubimporter.sourcetype.url=URL githubimporter.sourcetype.file=FILE / DIRECTORY githubimporter.source.url.title=URL githubimporter.source.url.hint=URL to a git repository. (e.g. https://github.com/mixxxdj/mixxx.wiki.git). githubimporter.source.file.title=Path githubimporter.source.file.hint=Path to the zip file / directory. Zip files must have a "zip" extension (file name ending in .zip). (e.g. /home/myuser/path/to/directory or /home/myuser/path/to/file.zip or E\:\\path\\to\\directory-or-file.zip). githubimporter.parent.title=Parent Page githubimporter.parent.hint=All of the imported pages will be created under this parent page. githubimporter.authenticator.title=Authenticator githubimporter.authenticator.hint=(Required for private repository) This can be a Personal Access Token, Client Secret (OAuth), or Username to be used for authentication. Personal Access Token is recommended, see Creating a personal access token page on GitHub Docs. githubimporter.password.title=Password githubimporter.password.hint=(Required with username only) The password of the user. githubimporter.convertsyntax.title=Convert to Default Syntax githubimporter.convertsyntax.hint=Imported pages will be converted to the default page syntax (see the Syntaxes section in the Administration). githubimporter.createhierarchy.title=Create hierarchy of pages githubimporter.createhierarchy.hint=Organize the imported pages hierarchically, following the heading levels defined in the GitHub Pages Sidebar (if it exists). githubimporter.validation.parent=Parent page already exists. Please specify a new parent. githubimporter.job.info=A job for the import has started. Please wait until it has completed. githubimporter.job.complete=Import completed. githubimporter.job.error=An error has occurred during the import. Check the Job log for more information. githubimporter.job.output=See the output. githubimporter.validation.required=(Required) githubimporter.button.import=Import
